casebody.data:
Deborah K. MCMICHAEL, Conservator of Mary Ann McMichael, LIP, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
SPECTRUM HEALTH HOSPITALS, Defendant-Appellant,
and
West Michigan Anesthesia, PC, and David P. Hejna, MD, Defendants. SC: 158687
COA: 342843 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the stipulation signed by counsel for the parties agreeing to the dismissal of this application for leave to appeal is considered, and the application for leave to appeal is DISMISSED with prejudice and without costs.
